TwoSampleMR 0.4.20

    • MR Base for two sample MR
    • Using VCF to handle GWAS

Generate VCF format from GWAS summary dataset

make_vcf.Rd

Takes relevant vectors and produces a vcfR object. This can then be written with write_vcf.

make_vcf(CHROM, POS, ID, REF, ALT, QUAL, FILTER, B, SE, PVAL, AF, N,
  build = "b37", vcf_reference_name)

Arguments

CHROM

Vector of chromosome names
POS

Vector of chromosome positions
ID

Vector of SNP IDs
REF

Vector of non-effect alleles - known also as reference allele
ALT

Vector of effect alleles - known also as alternative allele
QUAL

Vector of quality values. Can be NAs.
FILTER

Vector of filter values. Can be NAs.
B

Vector of effects for each SNP, relative to the ALT allele
SE

Vector of standard errors
PVAL

Vector
AF

Vector of allele frequencies for the alternative allele
N

Vector of total sample size for trait
build="b37"

Used in CHROM and POS. This argument used to generate the header. Must be 'b37' or 'b38'.

Value

vcfR object (with empty gt slot)

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
